name: Zimmerman, Appellant, v. City of Lebanon et al.

judges: Before Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Zimmerman, Appellant, v. City of Lebanon et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order dismissing the writ of alternative mandamus is affirmed at appellant’s cost on the part of Judge Henby’s opinion appearing in the Reporter’s notes.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Roy M. Bowman, City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Zimmerman, Appellant, v. City of Lebanon et al.
Argued January 9, 1936.
Before Schaffer, Maxey, Drew, Linn and Barnes, JJ.
March 23, 1936:
Warren G. Light, for appellant.
Roy M. Bowman, City Solicitor, for appellee.
